justification: The Offering ('The Ring is dangerous.') and Interfaces ('The pirate captain had a fearsome reputation.') do not address the IoT device management requirements outlined in the Ability. There is no mention of provisioning, authentication, configuration, maintenance, monitoring, diagnosing, or any IoT or Digital Twin-related functionality.
ability: The ability to provision and authenticate, configure, maintain, monitor and diagnose connected IoT devices operating as part of Digital Twin environment
